snippet: The chamber band Alarm Will Sound helped celebrate Nonesuch Records’ 50th anniversary, part of the Brooklyn Academy of Music’s Next Wave Festival.
abstract: David Allen reviews performance by chamber band Alarm Will Sound at Nonesuch Records’ 50th anniversary celebrations, part of Brooklyn Academy of Music’s Next Wave Festival.
lead_paragraph: The chamber band Alarm Will Sound helped celebrate Nonesuch Records’ 50th anniversary, part of the Brooklyn Academy of Music’s Next Wave Festival.

headline.seo: Alarm Will Sound Devotes a Concert to John Adams
headline.main: This Is Your Music on Lots of Caffeine
headline.print_headline: This Is Your Music on Lots of Caffeine
